name: Rodolfo Aicardi
description: '''Marco Tulio Aicardi Rivera''' (23 May 1946 â€“ 24 October 2007), better known by the name '''Rodolfo''', was a Colombian singer of tropical music who was active from the 1960s until his death. He is most famous for his song "[[La Colegiala]]" credited to [[Rodolfo y su Tipica RA7]].
